pages.text: The Swamp Rotfiend is a foul-smelling yet extremely useful ingredient, found in swamps and growing only on the trunks of $(l:plants/dead_tree)Dead Trees$(/l). It cannot be cultivated at home or in a greenhouse. $(br2)For careful harvesting that ensures future collection from the same fungus, it is highly recommended to use a $(l:tools/flint_knife)knife$().
Two Swamp Rotfiends in their natural habitat â€“ on a $(l:plants/dead_tree)Dead Tree$(/l) among the swamps.
